HEADER_LINE_3: You write down the details of the mission, we match you with a courier Pogo .(the match on our end is free, congratulations!)
DETAILS_OF_PACKAGE_INPUT_DATE: Date and time of pick up
DETAILS_OF_PACKAGE_ERROR: You must fill in all the fields
ABOUT_HEADER: Create screens directly in Method or add your images from Sketch or Figma. You can even sync designs from your cloud storage!
CUSTOMERS_RECOMMEND_POST_1: Thank you, in a few minutes I found a courier. You are revolutionizing the world of errands
CUSTOMERS_RECOMMEND_POST_2: I will definitely recommend everyone to use your services, it will save a lot of time
STEPS_NUM_HEADER_LINE_1: An interesting title of the step...
ERROR_ALERT_SET_DATA: An error has occurred. You are transferred to the beginning of the process
STEPS_NUM_1_HEADER_LINE_1: Where do you want the packages deliverd
POPUP_UPLOAD_FILE_INPUT: Select a file from your computer
POPUP_UPLOAD_FILE_LABEL_INPUT: Please upload a file in csv, xlsx format up to 5 MB
POPUP_UPLOAD_FILE_HEADER_VIDEO: How to upload a file correctly
STEPS_NUM_2_TYPE_PACKAGE_HEADER_LINE_1: What is suitable for your shipment
STEPS_NUM_2_TYPE_PACKAGE_HEADER_LINE_2: You can choose from more then one option
STEPS_NUM_3_HEADER_LINE_2: The more you bid, the higher the chance of getting a courier fast (yes, fast...).
STEPS_NUM_3_HEADER_LINE_6: Okay, The Couriers Are Waking Up...
STEPS_NUM_4_SENT_PHONE: We sent a one-time mobile code
STEPS_NUM_4_ISN'T_MYNUM: This is noy my phone number
STEPS_NUM_4_DIDN'T_RECEIVE: i did not receive a code?
TRACKING_SHIPMENT_SELECT_1: We have received your request for delivery
TRACKING_SHIPMENT_SELECT_2: Your route is distributed to our couriers
TRACKING_SHIPMENT_DELIVERY_CANCEL: Oh. The courier has canceled, but hey we're already arraging for you another courier...
TRACKING_SHIPMENT_CANCEL_ALERT: Sending successfully canceled. You are redirected to start a new mission in 3 seconds
